author: trawick
msg: Fix FreeBSD version check used when deciding whether or not to disable
APR sendfile support, following David Reid's idea of a general purpose
version string which can be used for easy comparison.

author: dreid

corrects that for BeOS and OS/2.  Untested for OS/2 so Brian?
